name: jira-github-linker
description: Turn Jira tickets (ABC-123) and GitHub issues (#456) into clickable links directly in VS Code via Hover and CodeLens.

jiraGithubLinker.jiraBaseUrl.markdownDescription: Base URL for Jira tickets. **Must end with** `/browse/`. Example: `https://mycompany.atlassian.net/browse/`

jiraGithubLinker.githubRepoUrl.markdownDescription: Base URL for GitHub issues. **Must end with** `/issues/`. Example: `https://github.com/my-org/my-repo/issues/`

jiraGithubLinker.enableHover.description: Show hover tooltips with links for detected Jira/GitHub references.

jiraGithubLinker.enableCodeLens.description: Show CodeLens actions above lines with detected Jira/GitHub references.
